name: Ship Shoot
description:
Move using arrow keys and shoot with space bar.

Simple shoot em up inspired by Galaga.

There are 2 enemy types and 10 waves.

The game has not been balanced.

If you'd like to download the latest version, go to the latest version in dev log.

You can find this version on Scratch as well: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/552317036

Made for "My First Game Jam: Summer 2021."
